entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LdapConnection Bind() takes longer on Windows 11 #79836
  • ILCompiler crash while doing NativeAOT build of Blazor Hybrid Application #79833
  • `MemoryMappedViewAccessor.WriteArray` throws uncatchable `System.AccessViolationException` when used to write to a very large `MemoryMappedFile` on a memory-constrained ARM embedded Linux system. #79832
  • [API Proposal]: `MemoryStream.GetString(Encoding? encoding)` #79830
  • Test failure: JIT\IL_Conformance\Old\Conformance_Base\ldarg_i\ldarg_i.cmd #79829
    8.0.0
  • MAUI iOS sample app size regression compared to .NET7 #79825
    Future
  • Connect_ThrowSocketException_Success failures on Linux #79820
    8.0.0
  • `QuicStream.ReadsClosed` completes before EOS is consumed #79818
  • [wasm][icu] Canonical locales are not in filters but users would like to use them #79816
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][icu] Locale aliases are not resolved correcly #79815
    8.0.0
  • [.NET 7.0 + WASM AOT] Assembly.GetName().Name crashes the app #79814
  • ConsoleLogger Queue optimization can lead to missed log entries #79812
  • Test failure GC\\LargeMemory\\API\\gc\\gettotalmemory\\gettotalmemory.cmd #79809
  • Test failure GC/Regressions/Github/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219/Runtime_76219.sh #79807
  • Delete ProcessXmlBase.cs #79802
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [Analyzer] Using StartsWith instead of IndexOf == 0 #78608
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/opt/ObjectStackAllocation/ObjectStackAllocationTests/ObjectStackAllocationTests.sh #79808
  • Cultureinfo for Norwegian is not working in blazor webassembly .net5 #53239
    8.0.0
  • Vector128 and Vector256 General purpose DotProduct tests fail #75791
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json: Add option to write trailing commas on serialization. #79793
  • Regressions in System.IO.Tests.Perf_StreamWriter #79099
  • [API Proposal]: FileSharingViolationException #79643
  • [wasm][icu] EFIGS shard lacks currencies that it should serve #79740
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Convenient integers reading #74489
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix build for DUMP_GC_TABLES defined in Release #79835
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix ldarg_i test #79834
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add sourcegen support for required & init-only properties. #79828
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Update project-guidelines.md #79826
    area-Meta
  • [mono][debugger] Fix Debugger.Break() behavior when running on release mode #79822
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove Mono SpanHelpers workaround #79821
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] [mono][interp] Add unbox when calling valuetype method through delegate #79819
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 6.0.x
  • Process.Unix: while reaping all processes, handle encountering direct children. #79817
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Update manual console tests after recent ReadKey rewrite #79811
    area-System.Console, 8.0.0

Merged

  • Skip parsing types in ILLinkTrim.Descriptors if not needed #79803
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use LockFreeReaderHashtable for some of the NodeCaches #79805
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Export unmanagedcallersonly method symbols #79424
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix ObjectAllocator assert #79813
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use `Unsafe.NullRef()` #79589
    area-System.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Cache DocumentUrl in PortablePdbSymbolReader #79804
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Pass metadata pointers to RyuJIT #79806
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Dynamic generate hwintrinsic tests #79552
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Do not overallocate SocketAddress.Buffer #78860
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Make sure that NS2.0 source generators are built #79810
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add instructions for disabling VS signature validation #79777
    documentation, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 4 #79324
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • More preparation for JIT\Regression test merging #79697
    test-enhancement, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Deconstruct for DateTime, DateTimeOffset, DateOnly, and TimeOnly #79499
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • Consider numeric string json for EnumConverter. #79432
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Respect SETTINGS_MAX_HEADER_LIST_SIZE on HTTP/2 and HTTP/3 #79281
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • fuse < and > with = when applicable #78786
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce OptLevel() in jit #77465
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimizing a series of divisions (#74020) #74314
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • improve SslStream exception after disposal #79329
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in CompareInfo.Icu.cs #79787
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Fix ConnectAsync with buffer on Windows #79669
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [NO-MERGE] Dummy PR to test PR benchmarks #77008
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • WIP: Create AND chains in bool optimizer pass #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix numbering of exposed `LCL_VAR`s #79772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Added a null-check for 2-dim array access #79450
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix condition for selecting build pools for official builds #79779
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] Convert exception messages to resource #79754
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Fix deviating XMLDoc for HostingEnvExtensions #79708
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Add 7 more specialized frozen collection types. #79794
    area-System.Collections

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: package publishing is not working #2120

PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Build target and host packages for WASM on the same platform #2133
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add `LLVM_CMAKE_CONFIG_DEBUG` and `LLVM_CMAKE_CONFIG_RELEASE` #2130
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix NAOT runtime libraries VS experience for WASM #2132

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet-watch tool missing in SDK #29609
  • Single file is broken in .NET 8 #29602
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • docker-compose dotnet restore goes forever on M1 mac #29610
  • .NET 7 - Internal CLR error (0x80131506) in dotnet ef cli #29423

PullRequests

Created

  • Include dotnet-watch redist output in layouts #29611
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add the Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.Workspaces as a reference package to the GenAPI Task project. #29604
    Area-GenAPI

Merged

  • Merge pull request #28707 from JanKrivanek/template-verifier #29568

Updated

  • add item template for directory.build.props and directory.build.targets #29526
    Area-Templates, Area-Common templates
  • fix locale-sensitive comparison of UnmatchedArgument error strings #29559
    Area-DotNet Test
  • Change .templateengine folder path #29449
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-dotnet new
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Do not eagerly discover CWD during parser construction #28836
    Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.2xx

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Add `private` and `namespace` accessibility modifiers for top-level types. #6794

PullRequests

Merged

  • Update primary-constructors.md #6806

Updated

  • Update params-span.md following LDM 2022-11-30 #6784

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Selenium WebDriver for .Net 6.0 do`nt starts in C# Interactive #66066
  • NotNullIfNotNull should work on input parameters #66065
  • Some options are not persisted and never set to non-default value #66063
  • Some editorconfig options are not persisted to VS settings #66062
  • Some errors should not fail delegate conversion #66060
  • Optimize delegate creation from effectively 'static' local functions #66057
  • Missing ref safety error for [UnscopedRef] indexer argument in object initializer #66056
    17.5
  • 'non-nullable field is uninitialized' inspection for backing field of required property #66055

Closed

  • Visual Basic doesn't support 'RefStructs' #66064

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add tests for CheckInvocationArgMixing #65916
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix crash while deserializing DiagnosticDataLocation #66061
    Area-IDE

Updated

  • OptionKey clean-up and integration tests #66016
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid reporting ref safety errors for discard assignments #65693
    Area-Compilers
  • Move VS specific option storage locations to VS layer #66042
    Area-IDE
  • Fixes and improvements for Run Code Analysis command #66010
    Area-Analyzers
  • Keep the block of else-if statement in "Use null propogation" codefix #66048
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Split out ref safety analysis into a separate pass after binding #64928
    Area-Compilers
  • Adjust calculation of invocation escape when return type is ref to ref struct #65857
    Area-Compilers
  • Implement new lookup rules for Primary Constructor parameters #66054
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Emit and report missing `Decimal-` and `DateTimeConstantAttribute` #65777
    Area-Compilers
  • Correctly parse local function with several async modifiers #66030
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Deprecate public constructors of various diagnostic analysis context types #64083
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Report error implementing interface with `[UnscopedRef]` member #66024
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Produce error when static local function captures a local with extension method method group conversion #65965
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Is pattern expression with in parameter avoid unnecessary temp in rewriter #65243
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Include [UnscopedRef] parameter attributes in synthesized delegate types #66035
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Swagger syntax too verbose in MinAPI #45683
  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter does not serialize HttpValidationProblemDetails.Errors #45680
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #45679
  • StatusCodePages middleware returns both JSON Problem Details & plaintext content for responses to requests from browsers #45678
  • [Blazor] Blazor Server/Webassembly should call `setEventDispatcherMiddleware` to wrap event dispatching and capture logs #45674
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Azure ASP.NET Core Logging Integration Site Extension 7.0.1 Causes 500.30 ANCM Startup Crash #45673
  • IIS with Blazor Webassembly ASP hosted application throws Exception trying to retrieve data from SQL Server (api calls) #45670
  • Component with incorrect parameter name emits no warning / error #45667
  • Need Urgent fix for CookieHeaderParserShared throws exception when last cookie contains invalid character in .NET7 #45665

Closed

  • Cannot reference the type IResult in a non web project #45637
    Discussions
  • ErrorBoundary is not catching exceptions raised in async methods returning a Task #45676
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #45651
  • [Question] Trigger async Event in blazor server side app #45510
    Discussions
  • Add BaseDN to Ldapsettings #45626
  • Document how to configure HttpClient base address in Blazor Server using IHttpClientFactory #25758
    8.0-MQ
  • Add ability to createObjectURL from IBrowserFile #27983
    8.0-MQ
  • Blazor wasm debugging SSL problem #45625
  • Please reopen https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/45182#issue-1456298401 #45643
  • kestral does not listen for https on dotnet new projects #45666

PullRequests

Created

  • Playwright 🎭 🛠️ #45682
  • Compatibility Suppressions #45681
    area-infrastructure
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `516940f` to `3fa7f98` #45668
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • PR feedback #45677
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • Don't set the status code if the response has started #45664
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add rate limiter context HttpContext feature #45652
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [blazor][wasm] unify startup bit more #45628
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, arch-wasm, 8.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2070412 #45630
    area-mvc
  • Add Name Attribute to EditForm component EditContext cascading parameter. Doing it capable to impleme… #45599
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Fix Web UI AOT Warnings #45580
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview1
  • [AOT] Fixing the problems with ProblemDetails #45646
    area-web-frameworks
  • JSON "null" request body rejected as an empty request body #41002
    stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0] Use new Arm64 Helix queues #45538
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ListView - RemoveAt Updates UI with Blank Rows on Android #12220
  • [Android] CollectionView: VirtualView cannot be null here, when clearing and adding items on second navigation #12219
  • DeviceDisplay.Current.MainDisplayInfo not working #12214
  • [Windows] TapGestureRecognizer not working on Entry #12213
    Backlog
  • [Android] Cannot update the Entry Background once established #12212
    Backlog
  • [Android] BoxView Opacity not working #12211
    Backlog
  • [Android and Windows] BoxView Background not working #12210
    Backlog
  • [Android and Windows] Setting the BoxView BackgroundColor is not working #12209
    Backlog
  • [iOS] NavigationPage InvalidCastException #12208
    Backlog
  • Custom http headers set in WebViewHandler are not sent #12206
  • TabbedPage Content can't InvalidateMeasure on the Android #12205
    Backlog
  • Failure to install maui-ios and maui-android workload #12204

Closed

  • [WinUI] Frame with an Entry causes app to freeze #9937
    Backlog
  • Basic Frame Test no longer passes on WinUI #10668
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • Frame does not resize #5600
    Backlog
  • AVFoundation Migration to .NET 7 Maui #12176
  • Have easy way to set initial BlazorWebView URL #11746
    8.0-preview1
  • LineHeight property on label affects "invisible" line 0 and pushes all other texts down #11998
  • [mac][iOS] content clip issue. #12022
  • [Android]Scrollbars Visibility property "Never" is not working properly in the ScrollView control #12028
  • XML documentation refers to non-existing Device.OnIdiom / Device.OnPlatform methods #12183
  • MapHandler not found exception (iOS) #12203

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] Fix Frame Renderer to use Wrapper View correctly #12218
  • Add BlazorWebView binaries to xmldocs artifacts #12215
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Add a null-guard in MenuItem to prevent NRE #12207
    t/bug, area/desktop 🖥️

Merged

  • [net7.0] Fix UpdateSemantics for UIStepper and UIPagerControl #12217
  • [WinUI] Fix the size returned when measuring Frame #11779
    area/layout 🔲
  • Added StartPath to get/set initial BlazorWebView URL #11942
    area/blazor 🕸️

Updated

  • [net7.0] Only add PointerGesture if PointerOver VisualState exists #12155
  • [Housekeeping] Alternative to #11795 #12134
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Setup `Frame` with all of the missing `Mapper` methods #11804
    area/controls 🎮
  • [macOS] Fix crash using Shell SearchHandler on Catalyst #11926
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [macOS/iOS] Fix RequestedThemeChanged event #11199
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • [Windows] Fix crash using complex html content #11409
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [Housekeeping] Port latest fixes from Xamarin.Forms to .NET MAUI #11420
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [iOS] Fix SearchBar focus issues #11698
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Correctly render ContentPage brushes background #11721
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • [Android] Clear before each Image Source change #11787
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [xamlc] remove `LoadInSeparateAppDomain` and `static` state #11982
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, 8.0-preview1
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Housekeeping] Added pending changes in Android AlertManager #11989
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (alternative) #12102
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • Address Android SearchBar keyboard issue relating to TextTransform #11981
    area/controls 🎮
  • Micro benchmark fixes #12178
    community ✨
  • [net7.0] [Tizen] Add missing Shell features in Tizen #12157
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, platform/tizen
  • Simplify hardcoded array of C# keywords in CodeBehindGenerator #12195
    community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12123
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Allow fetching values back with ExecuteUpdate/Delete/Insert #29898
  • Non-tracking ExecuteInsert #29897
  • Use HTTPS URL for 1-to-1 foreign key exception #29895
  • Please add methods for ExecuteInsert & ExecuteInsertAsync #29894
  • FirstOrDefault on DateTime column projection throws SqlException "The conversion of a varchar data type to a datetime data type resulted in an out-of-range valued" when sequence contains 0 items #29893
  • Why Collection navigations should never be null ? #29892
  • Throws an exception :A key cannot be configured on 'USER' because it is a derived type. while calling EntityBase as property in BaseMapping #29890
  • Alpine 3.17 for mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/aspnet:3.1 docker image #29886

Closed

  • Why Collection navigations should never be null ? #29891

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix HTTP links in messages to use HTTPS #29896

Updated

  • Update discriminator columns when PK-to-PK dependent type is changed #29876

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK] With .NET 8.0 SDK zip/tar.gz installed, showing a redundant .NET Runtime #15001

PullRequests

Created

  • When overriding RID for non-Linux, use $(Platform) not x64 #15153

Merged

  • Apply RID override behaviour from runtime to aspnetcore/installer #15143

Updated

  • .NET Source-Build 6.0.112 December 2022 Updates #15127
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #15145
